LeadPreferredSeller.name: LeadPreferredSeller
LeadPreferredSeller.description: Represents the relationship between a lead and the dealer account that the lead selects, or the relationship between a lead and the account that provides the lead.

AccountRole.description: The role of the Account in relation to the associated Lead, such as the Lead's preferred dealer or lead provider.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

Name.description: The name of the lead preferred seller.
